name: VECT_R
description:
Vect_R is an 2D arcade bullet-hell game. Dodge and kill the enemies and their spawners to gather the orbs to power yourself up. 

Vect_R is a game done for the Make-A-Thing game jam. This was completed within the 5 day time limit in the spare time I had off from work.  

Game Jam Words:

Mass - Collection of incoherent particles that form one body. 

Staccato - Sounds being abruptly disconnected.

Prolong - To Lengthen.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Click- Shoot

Right Click - Suck in orbs

The Team:

Me  - Design, Programming

Ben Welsh - Additional Programming Assistance

Updates:

Version 1.1:

- Balanced enemy waves

- Changed some enemy sprites for clarity

- Waves now spawn 2 seconds later each time

- Added new menu screens for a better user experience
